column4: I need to convert realplayer files into flv files through command line, does anyone know a good tool?
ok how about convert realplayer files to avi?
ok do you know how to get the codecs required through apt-get?
mencoder -ovc lavc -lavcopts vcodec=mpeg4 -oac mp3lame xxx -o xxx.avi PDF_q
mencoder Nodame_Cantabile_01_PT2_-_himura_KAORU.rmvb -oac mp3lame -lameopts preset=128 -ovc lavc -lavcopts vcodec=mpeg4:vbitrate=1200 -ofps 25 -of avi -o out.avi
and I was told I need DirectShow
ok how can I install it with apt-get"?
you might search for this. w32codecs is copyright one.
